pages.title: 优红蛱蝶
pages.text: Vanessa atalanta, the red admiral or, previously, the red admirable, is a well-characterized, medium-sized butterfly with black wings, red bands, and white spots.$(br2)It has a wingspan of about 2 inches ($(o)5 cm).$(br2)It was first described by Carl Linnaeus in his 1758 10th edition of Systema Naturae.

pages.title: 优红蛱蝶
pages.text: 相对大小：★★☆☆☆$(br2)始终活动$(br2)1种肤色$(br2)最喜欢的食物：minecraft:dandelion$(br2)种类数量：4$(br2)成长时间：无天数
